TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyInfo extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 XML 数字签名或 XML 加密 元素。

span.span: Represents an XML digital signature or XML encryption element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示 XML 数字签名和加密中的关键信息。The class represents key information in XML digital signing and encryption. 利用类, 你可以 imbed 与密钥相关的信息, 这些信息旨在帮助确定验证或解密 XML 文档所必需的密钥。The class enables you to imbed key-related information intended to help identify the key necessary for validating or decrypting the XML document. 单个密钥相关信息可以包含在一个中, 每种类型的密钥相关信息都有一个从派生的类。Multiple types of key-related information can be included within a single ; each type of key-related information has an associated class derived from . 有关``元素的详细信息, 请参阅 W3C 网站上提供的[XMLDSIG 规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)或[XML 加密规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/)。For more information about the `` element, see the [XMLDSIG specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/) or the [XML encryption specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/), which are available on the W3C website. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在对由通用资源标识符 (URI) 表示的资源进行签名时使用对象。The following code example uses the object when signing a resource represented by a Universal Resource Identifier (URI). 此示例将签名保存在新文件中。This example saves the signature in a new file. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CPP/xmldsigdetach.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CS/xmldsigdetach.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/VB/xmldsigdetach.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例在对 XML 文档进行签名时使用对象。The following code example uses the object when signing an XML document. 此示例将签名保存在新文件中。This example saves the signature in a new file. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CPP/xmldsigenv.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CS/xmldsigenv.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/VB/xmldsigenv.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例在对 XML 文档进行加密时使用对象。The following code example uses the object when encrypting an XML document. 此示例将加密的密钥嵌入到加密的 XML 文档中。This example embeds an encrypted key within the encrypted XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例在对 XML 文档进行加密时使用对象。The following code example uses the object when encrypting an XML document. 此示例将名称映射到对称密钥, 以将其标识为解密方法。This example maps a name to a symmetric key to identify it to the decryption method. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/CPP/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/VB/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

summary.span: 返回 对象中 对象的枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator of the objects in the object.

returns.span: 可用于循环访问集合的 的子元素的枚举器。

span.span: An enumerator of the subelements of that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同时从同一集合中提取两个枚举器不一定需要返回相同的迭代。Two enumerators taken from the same collection at the same time are not necessarily required to return the same iteration. 最初, 枚举器必须定位在集合的第一个元素之前, 且在使用之前, 必须由实现的调用方提前。Initially, the enumerator must be positioned before the first element of the collection and must be advanced by the caller of the implementation before use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同时从同一集合中提取两个枚举器不一定需要返回相同的迭代。Two enumerators taken from the same collection at the same time are not necessarily required to return the same iteration. 最初, 枚举器必须定位在集合的第一个元素之前, 且在使用之前, 必须由实现的调用方提前。Initially, the enumerator must be positioned before the first element of the collection and must be advanced by the caller of the implementation before use.
